channel.title: Utilization on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in Utilization on PlaceOS

item.title: ASHRAE Headquarters - Net-Zero Retrofit
item.description: ASHRAE is a global society advancing human well-being through sustainable technology for the built environment. ASHRAE is an industry leader and is dedicated to promoting a healthy and sustainable built environment being the creator of BACnet, a protocol and set of standards for the HVAC industry.

item.title: Government Agency - Multi-Tenancy: Space as a Service
item.description: This Government Agency required a multifunctional and scalable workspace management system to serve various federal agencies. It must accurately authenticate users to manage and charge for space utilization, and provide a scalable model suitable for other government spaces facing underutilization.

item.title: Canada Needs to Retrofit 482,000 Buildings by 2050—At the Current Pace, It Will Take 70 Years
item.description: Canada must retrofit nearly half a million commercial buildings to meet its 2050 net-zero target, yet the current pace it will take them 70 years to reach it.

item.title: Building & Region-Level Workplace Management
item.description: Control workplace settings to standardize policies across buildings, so you can scale workplace management while ensuring the right settings for each location.

item.title: A Guide to Energy Data Collection & Utilization
item.description: How to collect energy data in commercial buildings so that you can find out where you’re wasting energy like powering empty spaces.

item.title: December 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: December 2024 WorkMate updates include new parking utilization reports, kiosk customizations, recurring desk bookings, added language support and room alerts.

item.title: How to Choose the Best Meeting Room Booking Software
item.description: Learn how to select the best meeting room booking software. Explore common challenges, scalability concerns & the unique benefits of PlaceOS.

item.title: A Guide to Energy Efficient Commercial Buildings
item.description: Learn about energy efficient commercial buildings. How to collect energy data, integrate occupancy and establish baselines to optimize energy.

item.title: Downsizing Your Office? First, Take These 5 Essential Steps
item.description: Today’s work environment has seen dramatic shifts, prompting many companies to consider downsizing their office spaces.

item.title: Area Manager: Occupancy & Sensor Management

item.title: Enhancing Commercial Building Sustainability in a Hybrid Workplace
item.description: Explore sustainable practices for hybrid workplaces in commercial buildings. Find out how to reduce energy usage and promote a greener work environment.

item.title: How to capture occupancy data in the workplace
item.description: Learn how to capture occupancy data in commercial buildings using real-time location services. Optimize space utilization and enhance workplace efficiency.

item.title: How to Create a Desk Booking App for Your Office Needs
item.description: Discover the steps to effectively scope a desk booking app. Optimize your office space with a tailored desk booking solution that meets your requirements.

item.title: How to Successfully Return to the Office after Covid
item.description: Discover best practices for returning to the office after COVID. Explore how to create a safe and productive work environment in our comprehensive guide.

item.title: Indoor Wayfinding for your Workplace
item.description: Enhance workplace navigation with indoor wayfinding technology. Explore how these solutions can streamline movement and boost productivity in your office.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Working with Working from Home
item.description: oin our live demo to optimize hybrid work. Find out how to efficiently manage work from home and work status location for better team collaboration. Learn more

item.title: Approaching workplace optimization
item.description: The sales funnel has a pretty well-defined approach. Instead of using that to sell more products, how can we build better UX?

item.title: Four technology integrations to help during covid-19
item.description: Right now, it’s hard to focus on any workplace user requirement unless we address the biggest challenge: COVID-19.

item.title: New WorkMate Features: Experience Surveys, WFH Status & more
item.description: New features for our workplace suite, WorkMate, includes Experience Surveys, Resource Pay, WFH Status & Quick Booking.

item.title: Office space utilization is only half the story
